Cupcakes

Back to Home

Ingredients

  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup butter (softened)
  • 2 eggs
  • 2 tsp baking powder
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract
  • Red food coloring (for red velvet)
  • Cream cheese frosting

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and line cupcake tins.
  2. Cream butter and sugar until light.
  3. Add eggs one at a time, then vanilla and food coloring.
  4. Mix flour and baking powder; add alternately with milk.
  5. Fill cupcake liners 2/3 full and bake 20-25 minutes.
  6. Cool completely before frosting with cream cheese.
